name: DEPRECATED_AS_GCM_CEDM_hasUpdatedImportDataForRecord
description: To check the imported data is updated
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!configMap: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
    records: rule!AS_GCM_CEDM_typeConfigMapForDataMigration(),
    field: "recordType",
    value: ri!recordType
  )[1],
  and(
    local!configMap.order = ri!order,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      index(
        rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
          records: ri!importData.records,
          field: "uuid",
          value: local!configMap.uuid
        ),
        "updatedData",
        null
      )
    )
  )
)
